title: Richmond International Airport (KRIC) huge improvement in MSFS
description:
Richmond International Airport (KRIC) received a huge update which will really be loved by people using the airport in MSFS a lot. With the default scenery everything looks OK but with this update it will look great. A lot of details have been added both on the air side as well as on the drop off side including detailed signs.

For a full overview of items added to the marketplace this week have a look at the video below:
https://youtu.be/So7dN5o73Ug
